Articles.Content: I was playing ksp coming from minmus, but on re-entry, something wired happened. It refused to simulate drag. The spacecraft was at 900 m/s and accelerating at 2 km. Therefore, I couldn't deploy the parachutes.. Anybody else have this problem?
Thread moved to the support subforum, since this sounds like a bug.

Huh, that's definitely not good. Are you running any add-ons? Does this happen at other times too, or just on that one return? Can you describe your return style, and can we see pictures of the return craft?

 

Thanks!
-Claw

It happens on about 20% of re-entry's. Ksp is not properly simulating drag. The addons I have are deadly Reentry, FAR, And stage recovery. The spacecraft was a mk1-2, a heat shield, and two parachutes. I was coming from minmus, and had a periapsis of 15 KM.
You want to post this in the modded installs, this section is for bone stock.  I am positive its an issue with your mods.
Moving to the modded-install support section.
This is a common issue with broken DRE/FAR installations. Did you install using CKAN? If so, uninstall them and attempt to reinstall them manually.
It works now(thanks for the help)
